time now.description: Returns a new Time instance with the timezone set.

time parse.description: Returns a new Time instance while parsing a datetime string.

time today.description: Return a new time with the time set to midnight.

time yesterday.description: Returns an instance set to midnight yesterday morning.

time tomorrow.description: Returns an instance set to midnight yesterday morning.

time createFromDate.description: Returns a new instance based on the year, month and day. If any of those three are left empty, will default to the current value.

time createFromTime.description: Returns a new instance with the date set to today, and the time set to the values passed in.

time create.description: Returns a new instance with the date time values individually set.

time createFromFormat.description: Provides a replacement for DateTime's own createFromFormat function, that provides more flexible timeZone handling

time createFromTimestamp.description: Returns a new instance with the datetime set based on the provided UNIX timestamp.

time createFromInstance.description: Takes an instance of DateTimeInterface and returns an instance of Time with it's same values.

time instance.description: Takes an instance of DateTime and returns an instance of Time with it's same values.

time setTestNow.description: Creates an instance of Time that will be returned during testing when calling 'Time: :now()' instead of the current time.

time hasTestNow.description: Returns whether we have a testNow instance saved.

time toDateTime.description: Converts the current instance to a mutable DateTime object.

time getDay.description: Return the localized day of the month.

time getMinute.description: Return the localized minutes in the hour..

time getDayOfWeek.description: Return the index of the day of the week.

time getDayOfYear.description: Return the index of the day of the year.

time getWeekOfMonth.description: Return the index of the week in the month.

time getWeekOfYear.description: Return the index of the week in the year.

time getAge.description: Returns the age in years from the date and 'now'.

time getQuarter.description: Returns the number of the current quarter for the year.

time getDst.description: Are we in daylight savings time currently?

time getLocal.description: Returns boolean whether the passed timezone is the same as the local timezone.

time getUtc.description: Returns boolean whether object is in UTC.

time getTimezoneName.description: Returns the name of the current timezone.

time setYear.description: Sets the current year for this instance.

time setMonth.description: Sets the month of the year.

time setDay.description: Sets the day of the month.

time setHour.description: Sets the hour of the day (24 hour cycle).

time setMinute.description: Sets the minute of the hour.

time setSecond.description: Sets the second of the minute.

time setTimezone.description: Returns a new instance with the revised timezone.

time setTimestamp.description: Returns a new instance with the date set to the new timestamp.

time addSeconds.description: Returns a new Time instance with $seconds added to the time.

time addMinutes.description: Returns a new Time instance with $minutes added to the time.

time addHours.description: Returns a new Time instance with $hours added to the time.

time addDays.description: Returns a new Time instance with $days added to the time.

time addMonths.description: Returns a new Time instance with $months added to the time.

time addYears.description: Returns a new Time instance with ${1:years} added to the time.

time subSeconds.description: Returns a new Time instance with $seconds subtracted from the time.

time subMinutes.description: Returns a new Time instance with $minutes subtracted from the time.

time subHours.description: Returns a new Time instance with $hours subtracted from the time.

time subDays.description: Returns a new Time instance with $days subtracted from the time.

time subMonths.description: Returns a new Time instance with $months subtracted from the time.

time subYears.description: Returns a new Time instance with $hours subtracted from the time.

time toDateTimeString.description: Returns the localized value of the date in the format 'Y-m-d H:i:s'.

time toDateString.description: Returns a localized version of the date in Y-m-d format.

time toFormattedDateString.description: Returns a localized version of the date in nicer date format: i.e. Apr 1, 2017

time toTimeString.description: Returns a localized version of the time in nicer date format: i.e. 13:20:33

time toLocalizedString.description: Returns the localized value of this instance in $format

time equals.description: Determines if the datetime passed in is equal to the current instance. Equal in this case means that they represent the same moment in time, and are not required to be in the same timezone, as both times are converted to UTC and compared that way.

time sameAs.description: Ensures that the times are identical, taking timezone into account.

time isBefore.description: Determines if the current instance's time is before $testTime, after converting to UTC.

time isAfter.description: Determines if the current instance's time is after $testTime, after converting in UTC.

time humanize.description: Returns a text string that is easily readable that describes how long ago, or how long from now, a date is, like: 6 hours ago.

time getUTCObject.description: Returns a Time instance with the timezone converted to UTC.

time getCalendar.description: Returns the IntlCalendar object used for this object, taking into account the locale, date, etc.
